suite.name: Amazon Tests

test.name: Caso de teste 01 - Acesso ao Menu "Eletronicos"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (125.0.6422.141) detected in PATH at C:\Users\JesMat\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (126.0.6478.114); currently, chromedriver 126.0.6478.63 is recommended for chrome 126.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a frase "Computadores e Informatica"
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Verificar se o titulo da página fica "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia | Amazon.com.br"
kw.source_name: Verificar se o titulo da página fica "${TITULO}"

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.msg: Page title is 'Eletrônicos e Tecnologia | Amazon.com.br'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a categoria "Computadores e Informática"
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

test.doc: Esse teste verifica o menu eletronicos do site da amazon.com.br E da categoria de Computadores e Informática

suite.doc: Essa suite testa o site da amazon.com.busca_produtos

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (125.0.6422.141) detected in PATH at C:\Users\JesMat\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (126.0.6478.114); currently, chromedriver 126.0.6478.63 is recommended for chrome 126.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
